title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 3 - Personal Service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 3 - Personal Service

State Regulations
§ 3.1 - Personal service paid from federal moneys
§ 3.2 - Approval by state civil service commission
§ 3.3 - Exceptions by civil service commission
§ 3.4 - Payroll certificates
§ 3.5 - Computation of salary rate
§ 3.6 - Notification of appointments, promotions, etc
§ 3.7 - Payrolls prepared by comptroller
§ 3.8 - Payrolls prepared by departments
§ 3.9 - Sunday and holiday services
§ 3.10 - Repealed
§ 3.11 - Delivery of checks to temporary and per diem employees
§ 3.12 - Standard forms prescribed
§ 3.13 - Overtime meal allowances
§ 3.14 to 3.24 - Repealed
§ 3.25 to 3.26 - Repealed

Withholding Tax (§ 3.51 to 3.56)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 3

Statutory authority: State Finance Law, §§8, 109, 109-a, 110;NYS Constitution, art. V, § 1
[FN*] Resolution filed March 5, 1962 was not published in the

Official Compilation. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
